TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IsolatedStorageFileStream extends System.IO.FileStream

summary.span: 公开独立存储中的文件。

span.span: Exposes a file within isolated storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于读取、 写入和独立存储中创建文件。Use this class to read, write and create files in isolated storage. 由于此类扩展，你可以使用的实例在大多数情况下其中否则可能会使用，例如，构造或。Since this class extends , you can use an instance of in most situations where a might otherwise be used, such as to construct a or . 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 独立存储不适用于 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 相反，使用 `Windows.Storage` API 中包含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空间中的应用程序数据类来存储本地数据和文件。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心的 [应用程序数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何使用和将数据写入独立存储文件。The following console application demonstrates how you can use and to write data to an Isolated Storage file. 用户请求登录。The user is requested to log in. 如果用户是新用户，新闻 URL 和体育 URL 被记录为在独立存储中的个人首选项。If the user is a new user, a News URL and a Sports URL are recorded as personal preferences in Isolated Storage. 如果用户是返回的用户，将显示用户的当前首选项。If the user is a returning user, the user's current preferences are displayed. 在此示例应用程序的上下文中出现在此命名空间中使用的代码示例。The code examples used throughout this namespace are presented in the context of this sample application. 你可以使用[Storeadm.exe （独立存储工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/storeadm-exe-isolated-storage-tool.md)实用程序列出和删除与此控制台应用程序创建的独立存储文件。You can use the [Storeadm.exe (Isolated Storage Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/storeadm-exe-isolated-storage-tool.md) utility to list and remove the Isolated Storage files that are created with this console application. [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 打开 的唯一方法是使用它的一个构造函数。

span.span: The only way to open an is by using one of its constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 对象的新实例，通过该实例可以访问指定 中的 指定的文件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an object giving access to the file designated by in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用独立存储区的作用范围由当前正在执行程序集的标识和在其中运行的应用程序域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存储将仅的整个生存期内保持打开对象。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 要指定不同的独立的存储作用域，或要允许要保持打开状态的存储区 (因此多个对象可从它中打开)，使用接受的构造函数的形式对象。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. `mode`参数指示是否应创建新的文件、 一个现有使用，等等。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The is badly formed.
The is .
The directory in does not exist.

for isolated storage access

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class giving access to the file designated by , in the specified , with the kind of requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用独立存储区的作用范围由当前正在执行程序集的标识和在其中运行的应用程序域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存储将仅的整个生存期内保持打开对象。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 要指定不同的独立的存储作用域，或要允许要保持打开状态的存储区 (因此多个对象可从它中打开)，使用接受的构造函数的形式对象。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. `mode`参数指示是否应创建一个新文件或一个现有使用。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`参数包含只读的读/写和只写。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`参数指示是否应创建新的文件、 一个现有使用，等等。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用独立存储区的作用范围由当前正在执行程序集的标识和在其中运行的应用程序域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存储将仅的整个生存期内保持打开对象。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 要指定不同的独立的存储作用域，或要允许要保持打开状态的存储区 (因此多个对象可从它中打开)，使用接受的构造函数的形式对象。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`参数指示是否应创建一个新文件或一个现有使用。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`参数包含只读的读/写和只写。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致引发异常。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/source.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/source.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/source.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当不是在 I/O 操作完成时发出的异步读取或写入时，将更新流中的当前位置。The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write, not when the I/O operation completes. 必须调用与此若要了解读取的多少字节数。You must call with this to find out how many bytes were read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对象是可写的在流末尾写入将扩展的流。If a object is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream. 当不是在 I/O 操作完成时发出的异步读取或写入时，将更新流中的当前位置。The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write, not when the I/O operation completes. 必须调用与对象，此方法返回若要了解编写多少个字节。You must call with the object that this method returns to find out how many bytes were written.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为 true。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to true. 调用与`disposing`设置为 false。 invokes with `disposing` set to false. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();

summary.span: 清除此流的缓冲区，使得所有缓冲数据都写入到文件中。

span.span: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为缓冲区可以用于读取或写入，但不是同时同时执行两个功能。Because a buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but not both simultaneously, performs two functions. 首先，以前向缓冲区写入任何数据复制到文件并清除缓冲区。First, any data previously written to the buffer is copied to the file and the buffer is cleared. 其次，如果是`true`和以前将数据从文件复制到缓冲区以进行读取，该文件中的当前位置将减少的缓冲区中的未读字节数。Second, if is `true` and data was previously copied from the file to the buffer for reading, the current position within the file is decremented by the number of unread bytes in the buffer. 然后清除缓冲区。The buffer is then cleared. 使用方法重载时你想要确保中间文件缓冲区中的所有缓冲数据写入到磁盘。Use the method overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush (bool flushToDisk);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush(bool flushToDisk) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush (flushToDisk As Boolean)
public: override void Flush(bool flushToDisk);

param.name: flushToDisk
param.span: 如果刷新所有中间文件缓冲区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to flush all intermediate file buffers; otherwise, .

summary.span: 清除此流的缓冲区，将所有缓冲数据都写入到文件中，并且也清除所有中间文件缓冲区。

span.span: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file, and also clears all intermediate file buffers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载时你想要确保中间文件缓冲区中的所有缓冲数据写入到磁盘。Use this overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.

returns.span: 如果当前可用的字节数没有请求的字节数那么多，则总字节数可能小于请求的字节数；如果已到达流的末尾，则为零。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `buffer`参数可以为实例类或数组的以下类型之一： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或。The `buffer` parameter can be an instance of the class, or an array of one of the following types: , , , , , , , , , , or . `offset`参数指定了缓冲区中从其开始写入 （缓冲区中的索引） 中的字节的偏移量和`count`参数提供的最大将从此流中读取的字节数。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in buffer at which to begin writing (index in the buffer), and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes that will be read from this stream. 如果已到达流结尾，则返回的值是实际数字节，则为零。The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached. 如果读取的操作成功，是通过读取的字节数高级流的当前位置。If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read. 如果发生异常，则流的当前位置不变。If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged. 方法视为`buffer`作为一个字节，而不考虑其实际类型的块的参数。The method treats the `buffer` parameter as a block of bytes, regardless of its actual type. 同样，`offset`和`count`参数始终以字节为单位指定。Likewise, the `offset` and `count` parameters are always specified in bytes. 有关`buffer`字节数组以外的参数，这意味着元素索引必须乘以元素大小 （字节） 以形成的正确值`offset`或`count`。For `buffer` parameters other than byte arrays, this means that an element index must be multiplied by the element size in bytes to form a correct value for `offset` or `count`. 方法将返回零，仅当已到达流结尾。The method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached. 在所有其他情况下，始终至少 1 个字节从流中读取在返回之前。In all other cases, always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning. 如果不会从提供数据对象在调用，该方法将一直阻止到至少一个字节的数据可以返回。If no data is available from the object upon a call to , the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned.

Public Overrides Function ReadByte () As Integer
public: override int ReadByte();

summary.span: 从独立存储中的 对象读取一个字节。

span.span: Reads a single byte from the object in isolated storage.

returns.span: 从独立存储文件中读取的 8 位无符号整数值。

span.span: The 8-bit unsigned integer value read from the isolated storage file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何方法可以用于读取数据对象。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to read data from an object. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 获取 对象，它代表当前 对象所封装的文件的操作系统文件句柄。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current object encapsulates.

value.span: 对象，它表示当前 对象所封装的文件的操作系统文件句柄。

span.span: A object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current object encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不受支持，并且始终生成异常。The property is not supported and always generates an exception.

span.span: The property always generates this exception.

permission.span: 若要访问非托管的代码的功能。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: Security action:

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

span.span: The new position of the object.
One of the values.

summary.span: 将此 对象的当前位置设置为指定值。

span.span: Sets the current position of this object to the specified value.
The new position in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些对象支持流的长度超出定位，其他人在这种情况下将引发异常。Some objects support positioning beyond the length of the stream, others will throw an exception in this case.

span.span: The must be one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetLength (long value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)
public: override void SetLength(long value);

span.span: The new length of the object.

summary.span: 将此 对象的长度设置为指定的 。

span.span: Sets the length of this object to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定`value`的当前长度少于对象，则流被截断。If the specified `value` is less than the current length of the object, the stream is truncated. 如果指定`value`大于当前的长度的流，则流被扩展。If the specified `value` is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded. 如果流已展开，旧和新的长度之间流的内容是不确定的。If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are undefined. 若要使用此方法，对象必须支持写入和查找。In order to use this method, an object must support both writing and seeking.

span.span: is a negative number.

Public Overrides Sub Unlock (position As Long, length As Long)

param.name: position

span.span: The starting position of the range to unlock.

param.span: 此参数的值必须大于或等于0 (零)。

span.span: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than 0 (zero).
The number of bytes to unlock.

summary.span: 允许其他进程访问以前锁定的某个文件的全部或部分内容。

span.span: Allows other processes to access all or part of a file that was previously locked.
or is negative.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer)
public: override void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

span.span: The buffer to write.

param.name: offset
param.span: 缓冲区中开始写入的字节偏移量。

span.span: The byte offset in buffer from which to begin.
The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 使用从字节数组中读取的数据将字节块写入 对象。

span.span: Writes a block of bytes to the object using data read from a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`参数指定了中的字节的偏移量`buffer`从此处开始读取，和`count`参数指定了将写入到这的字节数对象。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in the `buffer` at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to this object. 如果写入操作成功的当前位置对象高级通过写入的字节数。If the write operation is successful, the current position of the object is advanced by the number of bytes written. 如果发生异常的当前位置对象保持不变。If an exception occurs, the current position of the object is unchanged.

exception.span: 写入尝试次数超过了 对象的配额。

span.span: The write attempt exceeds the quota for the object.
